title: Where did leaked U.S. secrets appear? On a chat app popular with gamers.
description: Leaked documents from the Pentagon and intelligence about Ukraine appeared on Discord, a chat app popular with gamers.

title: The great tech reshuffling: Hubs outside Silicon Valley are thriving
description: Silicon Valley is America’s innovation capital, but lenient remote work policies and a spate of layoffs have fueled an exodus of workers and cleared the way for rising investment in other tech hubs, especially Austin and Miami.

title: Elon Musk says he’s sleeping on a seventh floor library couch at Twitter
description: The Twitter CEO provided a six month update on his takeover in a live interview with BBC.
